thread.section_title: Intrepid Travel Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Intrepid Travel | www.intrepidtravel.com | 2 of 10
thread.title: Rod

author: Rod
title: Rod
text: My wife and I have been on two intrepid tours over the last 5 years and enjoyed both experiences. We are both fit 60year olds and had no trouble keeping up with the physical aspects of the tour. Our group of 12 mixed well with people of all ages, both singles and couples. We feel that an Intrepid tour provides a great insight into the local culture and avoids the large crowds and typical tourist attractions. We would not hesitate to recommend this company.
